7198.T.summary: ARUHI Corporation operates as a mortgage bank in Japan. The company products include home, bridging, miscellaneous costs and renovation, and investment condominium loans; fire, disease protection, and unemployment insurance products; home disaster finance; and mortgages for existing houses that are purchased and renovated by real estate agencies to resale. It also operates insurance and bank agencies. As of March 31, 2020 the company provides services through 154 offices, as well as through online. The company was formerly known as SBI Mortgage Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ARUHI Corporation in May 2015. ARUHI Corporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8772.T.summary: Asax Co., Ltd. provides real estate secured loans in Japan. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
